Articles.Content: Swifty, you will be getting the Medal of Kerbal Honor from the General. Good work Kerb!

SCIENCE!

#EDIT: Did you read my card? I hope you read my card.
Also, I NEED this KSP Intro. It is soo amazing !

Thanks, swiftgates for posting the pictures. I now at least got to see WIP pics of the tech tree, subassemblies a and whatever else was shown (If there are any others, that is, it takes a long time to make posted on tablets so I forgot)

I wonder if the crew reports are static (as in always the same) or a bit random. Maybe more scientifically gifted kerbonauts get better reports or give more science points?

Still I do like the way research is shaping up. It looks pretty cool, especially with doing experiments in orbit and sending the data back to Kerbin.
Yeah, maybe the less stupid kerbals give more eduacated observations, and the couragous ones try tasting, licking, ETC. on it
That'd be hilarious. I have a Kerbal that is braver than brave. He'd probably eat a chunk of it

Wait, there are lights inside the suits that you can use in EVA?

There are lights now. L key
